content.text:
Building Large Apps with Claude Code + Docker

CEO of Ability.ai demonstrates how to use Claude Code with Docker isolation to build and maintain complex applications with AI agents.

Key features:
- Docker containerization for safe development
- AI agent memory management
- Sub-agents and custom commands
- Complete workflow automation

Full tutorial & code: https://github.com/Abilityai/project_kami

#ClaudeCode #AI #Docker #AIAgents #SoftwareDevelopment #Coding #AITools #Programming #DevTools #Anthropic
